definition: A term used to describe the act of carrying out or executing a task, often referring to the implementation or performance of a specific action or plan. It is commonly used in various fields, such as engineering, construction, manufacturing, or project management, to denote the practical realization or completion of a particular design, concept, or idea.

examples.german: Die Ausführung des Projekts dauerte länger als erwartet.
examples.english: The execution of the project took longer than expected.

examples.german: Die Ausführung dieser Aufgabe erfordert viel Geduld.
examples.english: The execution of this task requires a lot of patience.

examples.german: Die Ausführung des Befehls war erfolgreich.
examples.english: The execution of the command was successful.

examples.german: Die Ausführung des Plans wurde sorgfältig geplant.
examples.english: The execution of the plan was carefully planned.

examples.german: Die Ausführung der Anweisungen erfolgt in der angegebenen Reihenfolge.
examples.english: The execution of the instructions is done in the specified order.
